Here‚Äôs my two cents. I would love nothing more to stay home and not work in order to protect myself and my community. 

Unfortunately I can not afford to do that. Many others are in the same boat. And many people have lost their jobs and have no income. 

The ‚Äúrelief‚Äù that has been provided to individuals and small business owners is frankly laughable. Meanwhile, billions have been pumped into the stock market and towards already large, highly profitable corporations. 

Don‚Äôt be angry at the people who want to protect their livelihoods, be angry at the government that makes it next to impossible for people to stay home and still feed their families.

At least you know there‚Äôs an issue with your behavior. 

Try to consider how you would feel if someone else said/did things the to you that you do to others. Basically treat others how you‚Äôd want to be treated. 

Instead of thinking other people are wrong and you‚Äôre always right, do your own research on their views and LISTEN. Other people have different experiences than you do.

Dude I‚Äôve been with 2 uncircumcised guys and it literally does not matter. A penis with a foreskin works just as well as one without. No mature adult woman actually cares if you still have your foreskin or not. 

If they give you shit, that‚Äôs not someone you want to have sex with anyway.

Honestly? Block her on everything. Change your locks. Change your passwords and remove her from any accounts she might be on. If you can‚Äôt remove her, make a new account. Tell your friends and in laws you are no longer speaking with her and to not tell her anything about your life. 

If you‚Äôre comfortable with it, maybe send her a letter and tell her as civilly as possible the ways in which she‚Äôs hurt you. And if she genuinely changes her ways, you will consider having an APPROPRIATE relationship again. You‚Äôre an adult and you no longer have to enable her behavior. 

If you haven‚Äôt already, check out 
r/raisedbynarcissists where there‚Äôs many people who have similar situations and upbringings.

I mean....are you attracted to certain girls specifically because they are teenagers or are you attracted to some girls who happen to be teenagers? 

21 isn‚Äôt a huge leap to be attracted to someone a couple years younger than you, but you shouldn‚Äôt have sex with minors obviously. 

I read the other comments you posted and you said you are intimidated by women. We aren‚Äôt alien beings, we‚Äôre humans with thoughts and feelings too. I‚Äôve been rejected when I asked guys out, and yeah it sucks but it‚Äôs not a big deal.

Do you have a functioning endocrine system? Congratulations, you are detoxing all the time. 

Don‚Äôt listen to that bullshit dude.

A culture is a shared set of beliefs and practices. Even the most milquetoast, midwestern, khaki loving culture is still a culture. 

There‚Äôs nothing wrong with loving your ancestral culture, even if your family has been in America for generations. It only becomes an issue when you think your culture is better than everyone else‚Äôs.

Stomach acid is an acid, bleach is a base. It will neutralize mostly but is obviously not great for you. Even if you went untreated, you would probably be in extreme pain and be sick for quite a while, but it‚Äôs very unlikely you would die.

Everyone always tries to play oppression olympics and it‚Äôs annoying. 

What pisses me off the most is the whole ‚Äúwhites have no culture‚Äù thing. There are MANY rich and varied cultures in Europe. 

‚ÄúStop using other cultures and practice your own.‚Äù

‚ÄúOk, I‚Äôll practice my own culture.‚Äù

‚ÄúWhat are you, a white supremacist or something?!‚Äù

Like yes racism is a real big fucking problem in the US and I would love it if everyone could set aside their various prejudices and treat everyone equally. But it‚Äôs not always white people‚Äôs fault for whatever misfortunes that might befall you. Blaming randos for shit that is not their fault is a great way to alienate potential allies.

Wow, same. 

I‚Äôm always thinking, ‚Äúthis wasn‚Äôt supposed to be my life‚Äù. 

Everyone expected me to go to an Ivy League university, and end up being a lawyer, doctor, scientist, or politician. Instead I‚Äôm a college drop out working a dead end job who can no longer afford any sort of medical or psychological care. I just want to take the easy way out and die.

As an American I think it‚Äôs because we live in one of the wealthiest nations in the world, but still see people starving on the streets and living in squalor. You can be the wealthiest nation in the world, but that doesn‚Äôt mean shit when the majority of that wealth is being hoarded by 5-10 people with significant political influence. Combine that with politicians that would rather squabble with each other over who is better and only care about being re-elected, and it‚Äôs the perfect storm for disillusionment. 

I do realize we have opportunities in America that many in other countries don‚Äôt. Unfortunately those opportunities are rapidly dwindling and getting farther out of reach for the average person. 

Instead of complaining about how bad it is, we should all try to make it better.

Honestly I‚Äôve been going through similar shit with my boyfriend. We split tasks pretty evenly as we both work, but he can‚Äôt be bothered to do his tasks properly. So I end up having to do my tasks, and fix what he messed up. 

Like I‚Äôll cook dinner, he‚Äôll wash the dishes, cool. I‚Äôll walk into the kitchen later and realize there‚Äôs water on the counter all around the sink, there‚Äôs food stuck on the insides of the sink, and the little metal strainer we use to catch food bits that sits in the drain is full of shit and bugs are eating at it. Then I‚Äôll pull out a plate, there‚Äôs still food residue on the plate. Get a fork, there‚Äôs residue on the fork. So now I‚Äôm rewashing dishes and cleaning the sink and counter. 

I‚Äôve told him SO MANY TIMES to wipe out the sink when the dishes are done, wipe off the counter, and dump out the strainer. I got so tired of complaining and asking I just started doing it myself. 

It‚Äôs so frustrating that I have to tell him to do things instead of him being an adult and noticing that they need to be done. If the garbage is full, the next logical step is to take it out. Why do I have to tell a grown ass man to take the trash out all the time?! If the floor is dirty, SWEEP IT! If the cats need food, GO BUY SOME! I can‚Äôt do 100% of everything 100% of the time!

Agreed! I see a lot of fight scenes where they choreograph fights to have the women fight like men. Females have to fight differently due to size, strength, center of gravity, etc. It‚Äôs just not realistic.

I love the color!!

I hope one day I can get my nails to that length. I‚Äôm happy for you, congrats!

Yeah I agree. That‚Äôs a pretty stupid reason to get yelled at; I‚Äôm a woman and I see nothing wrong with that statement. 

Wonder Woman is canonically buff, like I‚Äôm confused.
Why, out of curiosity?

There‚Äôs nothing wrong with enjoying history or old media. But don‚Äôt ignore all the good stuff that is out right now. 

You do have to look for stuff you enjoy. It‚Äôs not going to really be on the radio or TV but that doesn‚Äôt mean all music or media coming out of our modern time is shit. There‚Äôs a LOT of amazing shit out there. 

I kind of used to be like you as a kid, I was a bit snobbish and dismissive until I grew up and got perspective. I thought ‚Äúman they don‚Äôt make music like this anymore‚Äù. Uh, they do. One day there will be kids in the future looking back and being like ‚Äúwow they don‚Äôt make music like they did in the 2010‚Äôs and 2020‚Äôs.‚Äù 

There‚Äôs so much incredible new stuff you‚Äôre missing out on by focusing only on the past.

I‚Äôm a responsible smoker. I smoke far away from others, never in view of kids, and I always pick up my butts and throw them away. 

Still people give me so much shit. I have an anxiety disorder and I was on medication for it until I lost my insurance and couldn‚Äôt afford it. Sometimes having a cigarette in peace is the only thing that keeps me from completely losing my shit. 

‚ÄúSmoking shortens your lifespan!!‚Äù

Well yeah I hope it does.

Not a doctor, but could the bump be a Bartholin‚Äôs cyst? Look up some pictures and symptoms and see if it accurately describes what you‚Äôre experiencing. 

Thick white discharge is fairly normal at certain points of a woman‚Äôs ovulation cycle as you said, but if it‚Äôs unusual for you or causing discomfort, you should go get it checked out. There are also OTC antifungal medications specifically for vaginal yeast infections available at pharmacies.

Take my statement with a grain of salt as I am not a qualified mental health professional. 

I have a friend who had very similar symptoms as you describe. She had a lot of casual, unsafe sex and exhibited other risky behavior. The doctors thought she just had depression and was ‚Äútrying to feel something‚Äù which is not uncommon in depression patients. 

As it turns out, when she saw more qualified mental health professionals, she was actually diagnosed with bipolar disorder. The manic phase in bipolar disorder almost always manifests as risk taking behavior. 

Might be worth checking into.
It would not work. You‚Äôd have organ damage and maybe a seizure, but it is very unlikely it would kill you.

There‚Äôs literally a scandal going on with a local psych hospital in my area. Basically it came out that they were keeping patients longer than they had to in order to collect more money from insurance and the individual, and were horribly mistreating patients. 

I actually went to that one. I rarely saw a doctor, and the only ‚Äútherapy‚Äù was the occasional shitty group therapy. There was one nurse on staff for medication. The rest of the staff were behavioral care technicians and they were all young and unqualified. 

They put me on an insane dose of Effexor which made me fucking crazy. I did so many dangerous and out of character things on that dosage. 

One of the women who was in my ward had a history of benzodiazepine abuse and the last time she had came in she was high off of MULTIPLE Xanax bars. They kept feeding her anti anxiety drugs because she was ‚Äúdisruptive‚Äù, adding to the already large amount of benzodiazepines in her system. She said she didn‚Äôt remember the entirety of her last stay because she was drugged the whole time. 

They put adhesive fucking bandages on a woman who came in with road rash. She had jumped out of a moving car because she didn‚Äôt want to come.  She screamed when they changed her bandages. 

This is the same hospital that took away hearing aids from a hearing impaired man, then tried to keep him longer because he wasn‚Äôt talking to anybody. Bruh he can‚Äôt fucking hear!

It was generally a horrible experience for me and many others and honestly I‚Äôd rather complete suicide than go back to another psych hospital.

I hate to be the AKCHUALLY person, but most miscarriages are a result of improper gene crossover or other genetic abnormalities. 

So yeah, your body IS telling you something.

He wasn‚Äôt TRYING to go to the psych ward asshole, it‚Äôs not like he was picking and choosing and reading the ratings. He was TRYING TO DIE. 

Any medical care facility should be prepared to cater to patients who have dietary restrictions. Gallbladder surgery is fairly common, so if they weren‚Äôt prepared to feed someone with that issue, they shouldn‚Äôt even call themselves a care facility. Also not eating for days is NOT OK especially for someone recovering from surgery or who has food relationship issues. ALSO the goal of a psychiatric facility is to get patients as physiologically and psychologically stable as possible. YOU CAN‚ÄôT GET STABLE IF YOU‚ÄôRE NOT FUCKING EATING. 

I dare you to find the worst reviewed psychiatric hospital in your area, and check yourself in since you know so fucking much.

I feel your pain. 

My parents wanted me to go to art school. Yes, really. But I was like noooo I‚Äôm going to be a doctor or a scientist. Lol joke‚Äôs on me I‚Äôm fucking stupid. 

If there is one thing I‚Äôm good at, it is art I guess. I was always ahead of my peers when it came to creativity. I can spin an object around in my head and draw it. I do a lot of wood burning pieces. I once spent about 4 months on a hyper realistic velociraptor painting. 

I taught myself to read before age 3, walked early, talked early, did everything early. My parents said my first words were ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs that‚Äù. I was a ‚Äúgifted‚Äù kid. I was reading at a 11th grade level by the time I was 7. I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôm dumb in the traditional sense, just dumb about things that society values. Too dumb to follow what I‚Äôm actually passionate about. 

I‚Äôve always loved science, anatomy, helping people, creative problem solving, etc. When I was a child my parents had a medical encyclopedia for some reason and I spent a whole summer reading it cover to cover because I was so enthralled. I have a distinct memory of being about 6 and drawing a skeleton over and over because I was so fascinated by bones. I would give literally everything I have to get the chance to go to medical school. It‚Äôs the only thing I ever wanted this bad. Too bad I‚Äôm too stupid. 

I feel like I‚Äôm too dumb to reach my dream career, too smart to accept a shit one. I‚Äôd rather just die than live in this hellish limbo. 

My inner child fucking died years ago

People usually don‚Äôt pay attention to anything I say. 

Hopeless and powerless is right. I‚Äôve tried every possible avenue to improve my life and get help. Therapy, meds, psych hospitals, building a support system, learning coping techniques, it‚Äôs all bullshit and doesn‚Äôt help. Nothing relieves or even eases my pain. It hurts to wake up in the morning and realize I didn‚Äôt die in my sleep. 

People say everyone has a destiny and a purpose, you know? Maybe my destiny is to die by my own hand and someone who is affected by it will go on to make a scientific breakthrough in the mental health field. Or something.

It won‚Äôt ever get better for me but I appreciate the sentiment. 

The part in the song about blowing on the dandelions so much now they don‚Äôt grow anymore made me start sobbing. I tried and worked and wished for so long but all my opportunities are gone. Fuck. 

I also have a song recommendation for you. ‚ÄúKYS part 3‚Äù by $uicideboy$.

I‚Äôm in a somewhat similar situation myself. 

I would give anything to go back in time and do it all over. Unfortunately it would probably end the same. 

Life is so harsh. I want to leave too. It hurts too much to exist.
Ol Carole ‚Äú25 Nipples‚Äù Baskins

Probably his first job. Very likely new because he couldn‚Äôt find the menu item on the POS. Some younger kids have probably never seen a $2 bill before, maybe he thought it was fake. Most retail and food industry jobs have piss poor training. 

That doesn‚Äôt mean he‚Äôs an idiot or stupid.

There is also a lot of toxicity within the LGBTQ community. Especially towards us bi people. 

Some people act like no LGBTQ person has done a bad thing in their lives ever. No one is special because of the genitalia they prefer.

It‚Äôs really not fair. I had (and still struggle with) body dysmorphic disorder from a young age and CONSTANTLY tried to fit into a mold that just wasn‚Äôt made for me. I pushed myself so hard that I ended up developing a really painful knee condition from repetitive damage to the joint. I was a long distance runner and had an unhealthy exercise addiction. 

What helped me was finding something that my body actually excelled at, instead of trying to force it into a form it will never take. Women who are long distance runners are mostly tall, naturally slim with smaller breasts and narrower hips, and contain more lean, slow twitch muscle. I‚Äôm on the shorter side of average, wide shoulders, wide hips, and larger breasts. I found out I‚Äôm actually really good at sprinting and power lifting. I gain muscle extraordinarily fast, as it turns out. It‚Äôs about what works for YOU. Comparison is the thief of fucking joy, man. 

I‚Äôve gained a few pounds of chonk as a result of certain psychiatric medications, stress, and stopping intense exercise due to knee pain. Back in the day, that would have absolutely devastated me. But really, it‚Äôs not a big deal. People gain a little weight sometimes, so what? It fucking happens. I know I can lose some or all of it once I‚Äôm able to hit the gym again. I‚Äôm not going to tear myself to shreds again and spiral out of control over a number on a scale.

Do you struggle with negative self talk? I do, and I think a lot of people with depression do. 

What I found helps is to give those thoughts a name, as if another person was saying those things to you. I call mine Helen lmfao. 

‚ÄúYou‚Äôre worthless, ugly, no one loves you, and you‚Äôll never be happy.‚Äù

‚ÄúShut the fuck up, Helen. You‚Äôre annoying as fuck and you don‚Äôt know shit. I am deserving of happiness. Annoying ass bitch.‚Äù

I know it‚Äôs a bit weird, but I honestly like it and it helps me feel better lol.
Favorite person. This meme is probably a reference to BPD.

Do you feel guilty for eating food and drinking water? Do you feel guilty for taking a shower and clipping your nails?

Alone time is self care. Self care is a necessity for a happy life. You shouldn‚Äôt feel guilty for doing something harmless that is essential to your inner peace. 

I think you should explore why you feel guilty about wanting alone time. Then you can rationalize from there so you can stop feeling guilty.

Everyone needs a hobby that makes them happy. 

Don‚Äôt get rid of your tools. 

Maybe have a sit down talk with your wife and say something along the lines of ‚Äúthis activity brings me joy, I like to do it. Everyone needs alone time sometimes. If you could watch our kid for x amount of time while I do something that brings me peace, I would appreciate it. I‚Äôll watch our kid while you do whatever makes you happy for x amount of time.‚Äù
Ah yes let me put extremely germy objects on my newborn during a pandemic

Ugh same. I have been diagnosed with severe recurrent major depressive disorder among other issues and I‚Äôve been on an ungodly amount of psych meds for years. 

I don‚Äôt care about shit. The only things that bring me joy are my feral kitties and thinking about how one day I‚Äôll be a rotting corpse and all my troubles will be gone. 

I love astronomy and biology, but couldn‚Äôt pursue my biology major because of the strong likelihood that I have a math learning disorder called dyscalculia. I went and saw a psychologist who specialized in learning disorders and he strongly recommended that I pursue further testing as my symptoms were absolutely textbook. Unfortunately I couldn‚Äôt afford the crazy expensive testing and my insurance is trash. 

I‚Äôve been pretty depressed about not being able to follow my dreams and feeling like I was born in the most frustrating part of history. Born too late to explore the world, born too early to explore the stars. My generation is the only one in history that is living worse off than our parents. I have no hope. No joy.

I feel you. I have never been mathematically inclined, and I mostly blame the fact that I went to a private Christian school for my formative math learning years (I learned little to no mathematics) and just bad teachers. 

No matter how much tutoring I got, instructional videos I watched, detailed notes I took, study groups I joined, I would constantly fuck up. It‚Äôs the most frustrating thing ever. Trying so hard, and still seeing no results. 

Combine that with an anxiety disorder, it‚Äôs the perfect storm. I can‚Äôt count the amount of panic attacks I‚Äôve had during tests and quizzes. 

My math ability has improved significantly as I got older and as I learned to think about math problems critically. 

Still, math has kept me from pursuing my major academic dream. Knowing that I‚Äôm too stupid to follow my passion kills me everyday.

Why are people hoarding water? I understand in some areas the public water isn‚Äôt the best. In my neighborhood, the water is gross. It probably won‚Äôt kill you, but the taste is bad. That‚Äôs why I have a filtered pitcher and a steel water bottle. It‚Äôs cheaper and more eco friendly than buying cases of bottled water all the time. 

I‚Äôm 99.999% sure the water system won‚Äôt go down.
I‚Äôm currently wearing the exact same shirt lol

If the games are causing you distress, take a break. Games are supposed to be fun and stress relieving. 

If you find it hard to take a break, have a friend hold your games or console for a bit. Or play something soothing like animal crossing or something. 

Pick up a new hobby. Find genres of literature or cinema that you like. Research science or history. Pick up a new skill. There are tutorials on YouTube for every activity under the sun. Want to learn how to cook? Sew? Origami? Survival techniques? Woodwork? Yoga? Running? The resources to start and learn are online. 

If you‚Äôre of age, maybe find a job to occupy your time, if you‚Äôre not already employed. If not or if you need something else to invest emotionally in, look into volunteering. Animal shelters, soup kitchens, youth at risk, cleaning up beaches and whatnot. 

There could be so many other things you‚Äôre good at and have a passion for that you‚Äôre not allowing yourself to discover because of something innocuous like video games. 

I‚Äôm not saying this to shame you, or make you feel bad in any way, but not being good at a game is a really silly reason to end your life. I think the best thing you can do is learn real world skills and gain knowledge. Find something you can be confident in, man.
No, none. I just didn‚Äôt have an appetite.

I was sick for about 2 weeks. I usually get over illnesses within a week max, so this was unusual for me. 

Started with a tickling, itchy throat when I first noticed. Started coughing a bit. About 3-4 days in from the first symptoms I was SICK. Hacking, productive coughs and coughing fits. Sinus congestion as well. I had no thermometer, so I couldn‚Äôt test my body temp. But I know I had a fever. I felt hot and cold at the same time, sweaty, my boyfriend said I was burning up when he touched my head. Fever was on and off. It would seem to break, then come back a few hours to a day later. I was so weak I just slept the whole duration of it. I could barely get out of bed and move around. I think around a little after the first week of symptoms was when they peaked and then began to slow down. Fever stopped, my energy and appetite began to come back. My lungs sounded more clear and I was able to breathe easier. Cough lingered for a few days. 

Felt completely and totally better after about 14-17 days. It‚Äôs now around a month after I was sick and I feel completely fine. 

That being said, I was NOT tested. I do not know for sure if I did have COVID19.
I have not felt any marked difference in my lung health, no. I feel completely and totally fine now, like I was never sick at all.

Ah I got the same thing. Still could‚Äôve just been a rough flu. But knowing the circumstances, especially with me living in close quarters with many others, I just don‚Äôt know for sure. 

If it‚Äôs any consolation, if we have/had the same thing, I feel completely back to normal now. If your symptoms get unbearable, you should seek medical treatment. 

Good luck

People are dying and you‚Äôre sad because you can‚Äôt fuck rn?

Hospitals are overrun, healthcare workers are running out of PPE, the worst affected part of Italy is having to ship bodies to other regions for cremation because they‚Äôre at their limit, the mass graves in Iran can be seen from space, people are losing their jobs, the most vulnerable groups of our societies are at extreme risk, and you‚Äôre suicidal because no one will suck your pp?

I‚Äôm saying this as a person who has been chronically depressed and suicidal for the majority of my life. Dude, get some perspective. 

This will blow over eventually. Why don‚Äôt you go bust a nut, have a nap, and eat a snack? Relax a bit my dude.

Ugh it‚Äôs annoying. Yes, I know it‚Äôs bad for me. 

I take care to not smoke around non smokers. If I‚Äôm waiting for a bus or something, I go stand far away, downwind. I don‚Äôt smoke in the presence of children. I pick up my butts and put them in the trash. 

Like I‚Äôm literally prescribed benzodiazepines from my psychiatrist. I quit all my psych meds. I quit smoking weed. Nicotine is by far the hardest substance to kick, for me. I‚Äôve even done cocaine and opiates before, and I was like nah I‚Äôm good on that and haven‚Äôt touched them since. 

I know I need to quit, for my health. I know it‚Äôs a nasty habit. I‚Äôm working on it. Being rude and condescending to people won‚Äôt help them fix any problem they might have.
She needs serious psychiatric help. Holy fuck

It is weird. I live in a dorm, and other girls on my floor were sick around the same time as me and my roomie. You could hear the coughing through the walls. Everyone who was sick was pale and tired looking. The woman who cleaned our floor was home sick for about 2 weeks after it passed over the students. 

It‚Äôs crazy, man.
Uh like I still gotta work. If I don‚Äôt work I don‚Äôt eat. Not everyone is fortunate to get paid time off.
Ugh people who have no care or understanding for the mentally ill or have not experienced mental illness themselves should not go into mental health fields.

Not caring about others can be a symptom of severe depression. So is not having a sense of self. And anyone breaks down when they realize they have no support system. 

You say you hate yourself. Narcissists do not hate themselves. They think they are the smartest, strongest, coolest people ever, and everything that has gone wrong in their lives is someone else‚Äôs fault. They do not realize and do not care if they have hurt someone, typically. 

You DO need a diagnosis to know. If I had every medical or psychological issue I thought I did, I would have a brain tumor. But I don‚Äôt. 

People with NPD are not evil. People with BPD are not evil. People with psychotic disorders are not evil. Illnesses are just illnesses.  They are treatable, but some are more difficult to treat more than others. But all can be helped, if they want to be. 

No one with any mental illness is a write off. They are humans with a disease that needs treatment.

You can‚Äôt diagnose yourself. You are not a trained mental health professional. 

Most actual narcissists don‚Äôt have the self awareness to realize they have a problem, and don‚Äôt care. 

I would talk to a licensed mental health therapist, psychologist, or psychiatrist about your symptoms. Even if you are diagnosed with a personality disorder, it is not a death sentence. It does not mean you are a bad or evil person.

I smoked for most of my young adulthood. I would go through an ounce, maybe an ounce and a half in a week. That‚Äôs a LOT. I spent all my money and time on weed. All I did was smoke, all the time. Weed and benzos, all day. I HAD to be high or drunk to function because I was so fucked up from mental illness. I didn‚Äôt know how to cope any other way. 

People say weed isn‚Äôt chemically addictive, and in a way it‚Äôs not in the same way cocaine or heroin are. But people are also addicted to gambling and plastic surgery. It‚Äôs less about the substance, more about the person. 

Many stoners are really fucking annoying about it and some really lowkey are high functioning addicts. Like we get it, you can‚Äôt go 24 hours without a substance to make you feel ok. 

I‚Äôve been sober for a few months, and it‚Äôs helped a lot honestly. Fuck anyone who tells you a drug, any drug will permanently and magically fix your mental state. It‚Äôs something you have to consciously and consistently work on.
Also, ‚Äúoh you‚Äôre bi have a threesome with me and my ugly ass boyfriend?‚Äù Bitch get fucked

That‚Äôs like a medical doctor saying ‚Äúuh your disease is too hard for me to treat, please stop coming here‚Äù. Like bro what

Ugh I feel you. I‚Äôm a queer woman, and when I was looking for a female partner it was a struggle.  

I think a lot of it comes down to a misguided identity complex, like ‚Äúoh I‚Äôm LGBT so that means I have to act and look like this and like these things‚Äù. Or people who don‚Äôt feel connected or a part of a community take on these characteristics to show they belong. And of course there are people who invent certain labels in order to feel special. 

It‚Äôs very frustrating. I hope you find someone who is right for you.

You got to keep your phone in the psych hospital? Damn I‚Äôm jealous, I wasn‚Äôt even allowed to have my hair tie or my nose ring. 

The more you play along, the faster they let you out. Take the meds, talk to the staff and other patients, participate in group and individual therapy. 

Even if you do get badly injured, they‚Äôll transport you to a facility where you can get fixed up, then take you right back. Purposefully injuring yourself will only make them keep you longer. 

It really SUCKS, and I felt trapped when I was in too. But you can do it. Maybe tell one of the staff members you‚Äôre feeling claustrophobic and anxious, and see if you can take a supervised walk on the grounds, or even just stand outside in the sun for a bit.
Based on the anchor scars, it looks like maybe a reduction and/or lift gone bad. But the shape of the actual breasts are so weird, like they have implants. Just wtf

Let me tell you this, as a queer person. 

You are NOT obligated to come out to anyone. 

I see it all the time, and the pressure to come out when you‚Äôre not ready is immense, usually from cishet people who mean well but don‚Äôt understand our experiences. Coming out is an incredibly personal decision and process. There is no official timeline or way to come out. 

If it‚Äôs not safe, if it jeopardizes your ability to access resources, if you‚Äôre anxious, if you‚Äôre being pressured, or just uncomfortable, you do not have to come out.  Family, friends, coworkers, and people in positions of authority like bosses or teachers have no right to know about your sexual orientation or gender identity. It‚Äôs something you disclose whenever you want. The only people who may need to know about your sexual orientation or gender identity are medical staff. 

Ending your life because you‚Äôre not ready to come out would be super tragic and senseless.

Severe major depressive disorder with a history of delusions and hallucinations. PTSD and GAD. The psychiatrist who I saw in the psych hospital diagnosed me with severe major depressive disorder without psychosis. And just kind of blamed my other symptoms on my marijuana use at the time. Did not like him for the whole ‚Äúweed is evil‚Äù thing and other reasons. 

Saw another psychiatrist who prescribed me lexapro in combination with abilify, which is an atypical antipsychotic. Worked very well to control my insane mood swings and kept me stable. 

But, I‚Äôve been on so many psych drugs to the point I gave up and stopped taking them. I was tired of spending the money on them, tired of the withdrawal symptoms if I forgot and took them a little too late, tired of the stigma, tired of my family constantly shitting on me for taking medication, tired of the drugs losing efficacy, tired of my insurance fucking me over, and real tired of the side effects. 

I‚Äôm off my meds for the first time in many years, and I‚Äôll be honest, I‚Äôve been extremely depressed. And right now I can‚Äôt afford to go back on psych drugs. Maybe once I‚Äôm more financially stable I‚Äôll get back on the medication train.

However, I recently passed a precalculus and trigonometry class at my university with a B. I was so proud of myself. It‚Äôs possible to get better at math. Like any skill, you MUST practice. If you don‚Äôt understand the way your teacher or professor teaches it, look in the text book, find YouTube videos and websites like Khan Academy.
